# color

**Instance Property**

The sprite’s color.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var color: UIColor { get set }
```

```swift
@MainActor var color: NSColor { get set }
```

```swift
var color: UIColor { get set }
```

## Discussion

If the [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKSpriteNode/texture] property is non-`nil`, the red, green, and blue values of the color property are blended with the texture before the texture is drawn and the alpha property is ignored. If the [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKSpriteNode/texture] property is `nil`, the color (including the alpha component) is used to draw a single-color rectangle.

## Tinting a Sprite

- **Tinting a Sprite**: Provide a color and blend factor to additively color your sprite.
- **colorBlendFactor**: A floating-point value that describes how the color is blended with the sprite’s texture.
